description: The largest and most prestigious shipbuilding company in Water 7, led by Mayor Iceburg. Galley-La Company unified all of Water 7's shipyards into a single worldwide corporation that supplies ships to the World Government.

keyEvents.title: Meeting at Galley-La
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Nami, and Usopp visit Galley-La Company headquarters and meet Iceburg, the company president and mayor of Water 7.
keyEvents.significance: First introduction to Galley-La Company, which will be central to the Water 7 Arc's plot involving the Pluton blueprints and CP9.

statusHistory.reason: Galley-La Company is operational and thriving

name.japanese: ウォーターセブンの街

description: The main streets and canals of Water 7, featuring the city's unique water-based transportation system with Yagara Bulls and intricate networks of elevated sidewalks and waterways.

keyEvents.title: Zoro vs Franky Family
keyEvents.description: Zoro encounters and defeats members of the Franky Family on the streets of Water 7.
keyEvents.significance: First confrontation between the Straw Hats and the Franky Family.

keyEvents.title: Money Stolen
keyEvents.description: The Franky Family successfully steals 200 million beli from the Straw Hats on the streets.
keyEvents.significance: Critical theft that drives the conflict in the Water 7 Arc.

keyEvents.title: Robin's Mysterious Meeting
keyEvents.description: Sanji spots Robin following a masked figure through the streets before they both disappear.
keyEvents.significance: First hint at Robin's secret involvement with CP9.

statusHistory.reason: The streets are bustling with activity

name.japanese: ウォーターセブンの運河

description: The extensive network of waterways that crisscross Water 7, serving as the primary transportation system for the city. Yagara Bulls and boats navigate these canals.

keyEvents.title: Exploring Water 7
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats explore the unique canal system of Water 7, experiencing the city's water-based transportation.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases the distinctive geography and culture of Water 7.

statusHistory.reason: The canals are actively used for transportation

name.japanese: ウォーターセブンの市場

description: The local marketplace in Water 7 where citizens and visitors can purchase fresh food, supplies, and other goods. Features maze-like sidewalks typical of the city's architecture.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Market Visit
keyEvents.description: Sanji visits the market to shop for ingredients, experiencing the local culture and confusing layout of Water 7's sidewalks.
keyEvents.significance: Shows daily life in Water 7 and positions Sanji to later witness Robin with the mysterious figure.

statusHistory.reason: Market is operational with vendors selling goods

name.japanese: ウォーターセブンの両替所

description: A money exchange establishment in Water 7 where the Straw Hats converted their Skypiea gold into beli currency.

keyEvents.title: Gold Exchange
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats successfully exchange their Skypiea gold for 300 million beli at this establishment.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the crew's significant wealth that becomes the target for theft.
